press_toggle_button.description: Press the toggle button to change settings.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to ensure it functions properly.

rotate_toggle_button.description: Rotate the toggle button to switch modes.

clean_lens.description: Clean the lens to ensure clear image capture.

adjust_lens.description: Rotate the camera lens to adjust the focus.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it presses easily.

press_button.description: Press the button to capture a photo.

press_body.description: Press the body of the camera to hold it steady.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the body of the camera to keep it dust-free.

clean_all.description: Clean the entire camera, including the body, lens, button, and toggle button.

operate_camera.description: Press the button to capture a photo, and then clean the entire camera.

clean_whole_camera.description: Clean the entire camera including the camera body, lens, toggle button and button.
